review: I bought this product and unfortunately had to return it. I currently live outside of the United States and as a result I am unable to access the content on the Amazon Fire TV. I think it should be specified in the product details that this product is not for use outside of the United States due to licensing limitations. Other than that it looks like a great device but, unfortunately, it is not fit for use outside of the jurisdiction of the United States.
author: Deborah Jacob "I am an author and a librarian, and I happily now live in the realm of audio books."
